original_text: The priest must not give the Lord's holy gifts to people who are not from Aaron's family. The gifts would become unclean.
korean_text: 이스라엘 자손이 여호와께 드리는 성물을 그들은 속되게 하지 말지니

sentences.original_text: The priest must not give the Lord's holy gifts
sentences.korean_translation: 제사장은 주의 거룩한 선물을 주어서는 안 됩니다

sentences.original_text: to people who are not from Aaron's family
